Through web development in particular I've found a creative outlet that has allowed me to explore my interests and push the boundaries of my imagination. projects.title: Virtual Drag and Drop
projects.description: I had a lot of fun working on this project and got to learn a lot of new features with computer vision. and learned basic tensorflow implementations

projects.title: Jetpack Compose Graphing library
projects.description: Personal project for others to use, I realized jetpack compose does not have a library for charts/graphs so I decided to use my framework knowledge to make one.

projects.title: Logistics Invoice Application
projects.description: For this project I developed an invoicing system for a logistics company, which calculates the final pay for each driver and uses google maps api for distance trakcing.
